author: wired blogs
text: date: thu 10/21/1999 10:50 am from: david honig (honig@sprynet.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: comdexif there were ever a need for an aggressive rights attorney, your story about age discrimination "exec is too young for comdex" is it ("exec is too young for comdex," 21.oct.99). imagine if they had excluded those over 50(wheelchairs and oxygen bottles not permitted on the floor).
